Developer Interface¶

Data Structure¶

items module data (ecproduct.items):

scraped information definition. one item class is mapped to one part of webpage or one table of database or one webpage. the column name of corresponding table is the same with the filed name of item. platform_code and product_id can ensure only one product

status - specify the record status. 0created; 1+updated, -1deleted.

the value of ‘updated’ is the number of update times

class ecproduct.items.Attribute(*args, **kwargs)[source]¶

primary_key defines primary key of table. combination defines combination relationship between fields

VVIC Spider API¶

  • Market type of vvic.com:

    1. website - https://www.vvic.com

    2. city - https://www.vvic.com/gz

    3. mall - https://www.vvic.com/gz/shops/19

    4. floor - http://www.vvic.com/hz/shops/516#1

    5. shop - https://www.vvic.com/shop/42780

class ecproduct.spiders.vvic.VvicSpider(*args, **kwargs)[source]¶
__init__(url, entrance_page, data_type, home_item_id=None, platform_code='VC001', keyword='', item_num='100', city='gz')[source]¶

url is str or list, accordingly home_item_id is str or list.

entrance_page:

The entrance which spider is in(this is relative with url)

data_type:

The last infomation type which is will be gotten. product, market, category, etc.

parse_from_city_index_page(response)[source]¶

parse city market index page to get ‘mall’ market info(the tab ‘市场’ in web page’)

city market index e.g.: http://www.vvic.com/gz

parse_from_contact_page(response)[source]¶

Get the basic info about the website

parse_from_index_page(response)[source]¶

Parse website index page to get ‘city’ market info. Indext url: http://www.vvic.com

parse_from_mall_index_page(response)[source]¶

parse mall market index page to get ‘floor’ market info and ‘shop’ market info mall market index e.g.: http://www.vvic.com/xt/shops/400

parse_from_market_shop_page(response)[source]¶

Parse market with product page to get all product info in this market. Market ‘shop’ page: https://www.vvic.com/shop/43929

parse_from_market_with_product_page_pagination(response)[source]¶

parse market with product page to get all product info in this market

parse_from_search_page(response)[source]¶

parse search index page to get category info entrance url: http://www.vvic.com/gz/list/index.html

parse_from_search_page_with_top_category(response)[source]¶

parse top category search page to get category info

parse_product_from_product_page(response)[source]¶

Parse product detail page to get product info.

parse_searched_product_from_search_ajax_page(response)[source]¶

Parse the search page to get the product info. The result page not only include product, and also include shop.

Parameters

  • keyword (str) – The searched keyword

  • item_num (str) – Number of item whick will be scraped

start_requests()[source]¶

data_type: product, category, market.

1688 Spider API¶

class ecproduct.spiders.a1688.A1688Spider(*args, **kwargs)[source]¶
__init__(url, entrance_page, data_type, home_item_id=None, platform_code='HG058', keyword='', item_num='100')[source]¶

Initialize self. See help(type(self)) for accurate signature.

parse_from_index_page(response)[source]¶

Index URL: https://www.1688.com/

  1. Parse category:

    Category type:

    • There is category ID.

      URL: https://fuzhuang.1688.com/nvzhuang

parse_from_search_page(response)[source]¶
parse_product_from_product_page(response)[source]¶

Parse product detail page.

  • Product URL example:

    • Unshelf product:

      https://detail.1688.com/offer/543884257260.html

    • product which has three price range:

      https://detail.1688.com/offer/544560773525.html

    • product which has three price and discount price range:

      https://detail.1688.com/offer/539065306832.html

    • product which has only one price range:

      https://detail.1688.com/offer/40976180711.html https://detail.1688.com/offer/543218337857.html

parse_searched_product_from_search_result_page(response)[source]¶

Parse the search page to get the product info. The result page not only include product, but also include shop.

Parameters

  • keyword (str) – The searched keyword

  • item_num (str) – Number of item whick will be scraped
